com.captainalm.lib.calmnet.packet.factory

Interface IPacketFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CALMNETPacketFactory, CALMNETPacketFactoryWithPacket

    public interface IPacketFactory
    This interface provides the ability to construct IPackets given their PacketProtocolInformation.
    Author:
    Captain ALM

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areStreamPacketsPreferred()
      Gets if getPacket(PacketProtocolInformation) prefers returning IStreamedPackets if possible.
      IPacket getPacket(PacketProtocolInformation information)
      Constructs a IPacket of the protocol specified by the passed PacketProtocolInformation instance.
      void setStreamPacketsPreferred(boolean preferred)
      Sets if getPacket(PacketProtocolInformation) prefers returning IStreamedPackets if possible.

    • Method Detail

      • getPacket

        IPacket getPacket(PacketProtocolInformation information)
        Constructs a IPacket of the protocol specified by the passed PacketProtocolInformation instance.
        Parameters:
        information - The protocol information to use.
        Returns:
        The constructed packet or null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - The information is null.

      • areStreamPacketsPreferred

        boolean areStreamPacketsPreferred()
        Gets if getPacket(PacketProtocolInformation) prefers returning IStreamedPackets if possible.
        Returns:
        If streamed packets are preferred for construction.

      • setStreamPacketsPreferred

        void setStreamPacketsPreferred(boolean preferred)
        Sets if getPacket(PacketProtocolInformation) prefers returning IStreamedPackets if possible.
        Parameters:
        preferred - If streamed packets are preferred for construction.
